name: Claritus Management Consulting
description:
Claritus, established in 2008, is privately held, 100% promoter funded company supported by very pragmatic and successful serial entrepreneurs. The company, based out of India, offers various IT outsourcing services to a wide range of national and international clients. The company has a good track record of soaring revenue that has empowered Claritus with useful resources to mobilize and deliver large scale projects.
Our simple success mantra is to keep Clarity at work, bring Innovative ideas and adapt to modern Technologies. We, at Claritus, have allowed our clients to improve their bottom line leveraging our huge talent pool, deep technology expertise, years of experience and exposure to various industries. Claritus is known to be a leader in IT consulting industry and committed to providing consistent value to clients’ businesses.
Though outsourcing is a maturing market, mid-sized software companies and enterprises often struggle to find a reliable, nimble, and capable outsourcing vendor. Claritus has the judicious mix of infrastructure, flexibility, and experience to provide effective and comprehensive solutions to mid-sized software companies and enterprises.
Claritus aims at providing a process backbone and framework for a business, concept or an idea so that quick and effective application development can be undertaken, thus your business process is most efficient. It specializes in building bespoke web-based business applications and in providing independent IT consultancy and management advice services.
After extensive five years in the industry, Claritus operates with a team that has put in thousands of hours in the industry and has helped large and small enterprises achieve their desired objectives leading to the launch of around 155 programs for these clients. And yet Claritus retains the hunger and zeal for customized services and the swiftness of a boutique consulting company.
